EMERGENCY RESOURCE LIST â€” Phillips/Powderhorn Area

If you or someone you know needs help NOW, call these numbers:

CRISIS & SAFETY
- Crisis hotline (24/7): (612) 596-1223
- Domestic violence hotline: (612) 871-5111 (Harriet Tubman Center)
- Youth crisis line: (612) 338-6425

FOOD
- Briva Health food shelf: (612) 353-4522 (Tue-Fri 10-4)
- Salvation Army Emergency: (612) 332-5855
- Community Emergency Assistance Programs (CEAP): (763) 566-9600

SHELTER & HOUSING
- Hennepin County shelter intake: (612) 348-9410
- Simpson Housing Services: (612) 455-2900
- Mary's Place (women & children): (612) 338-4577

LEGAL AID
- Legal Aid Society of Minneapolis: (612) 334-5970
- Volunteer Lawyers Network: (612) 752-6677
- Immigration legal help (MIRAC): (612) 235-0091

HEALTH
- NorthPoint Health & Wellness: (612) 767-9159
- Native American Community Clinic: (612) 872-8086
- Portico Healthnet (insurance help): (651) 489-2273

Print this list and share it. Post it on your fridge. Give it to your neighbors.

Updated February 2026 by Phillips Neighborhood Network.
